document.full_text: a body pulled from the susquehanna river in maryland has been identified as that of a north carolina teenager who has been missing since december, maryland state police confirmed on friday.
document.title: body pulled from maryland river identified as missing teen
lines_and_colors: a body pulled from the susquehanna river in maryland has been identified as that of a north carolina teenager who has been missing since december, maryland state police confirmed on friday.
